amendment.description: Amendment sought to require an analysis on the extent to which costs imposed on incorporated entities by Federal regulatory programs are offset by subsidies given to those entities by the Federal government.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 1 printed in the Congressional Record to require an analysis on the extent to which costs imposed on incorporated entitites by regulatory programs are offset by Federal subsidies, including grants and preferential loans; limits expenditures to carry out the act to $1 million; and sunsets the act at the end of 4 years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hoeffel amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 217 (Roll no. 335).
